# Afterwards (2023 film)

Afterwards () is a Canadian short documentary film, directed by Romane Garant Chartrand and released in 2023. The film centres on a group of women who are participating in a support group to help each other recover and move on from having been victims of domestic violence.
The film premiered at the 2023 Montreal International Documentary Festival, and was subsequently screened at the 2024 Clermont-Ferrand International Short Film Festival.
